text: Colin Francis Dufty (29 November 1889 - 9 December 1967), was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). Dufty was the son of Francis Herbert and Louisa (née Palmer) Dufty. He later served in World War I and World War II. == Notes == == External links == * *Colin Dufty's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1889 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:VFL/AFL players born in Fiji Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Sportspeople from Suva Category:Fijian people of Irish descent Category:Fijian emigrants to Australia Category:Australian people of Irish descent
title: Colin Dufty
